import { Form, useNavigate, useNavigation } from 'react-router-dom' import classes from './CatForm.module.css' function CatForm({ method, cat }) { const navigate = useNavigate() const navigation = useNavigation() const isSubmitting = navigation.state === 'submitting' function cancelHandler() { navigate('..') } // Input names must be set to use Router Form! return (

) } export default CatForm
